properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Well I went down to Citadel And I slept in a park Went on up to Caer Mithen For a tourney in the dark

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: And I'll search the world over For my Lady in Garb Yeah, I'll search the world over For an SCA Girl

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Cruised on out to Outlandish Nearly blew me away Yeah, the wind there was awful But I stayed anyway

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Got drunk at St. Golias They put me up for the night Now I always have liked them The way they drink, and they fight

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Called my Knight from a pay phone Said I'm down to my last He said "I gave you your armor Now go call your dad"

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And the Duchess that he married Well she hung up the phone No she never did like me But I can stand on my own

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Sold my armor at Pennsic Spent it all in one night Buyin' drinks in a tavern For a guy who don't fight

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Cruised on out to Estrella Atens piped on the field Yeah they still lost the war though Never had time to yield
